summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of thought-stick app. All core features working correctly including board load, composer, throwable notes, sticker placement, expanded cards, zoom controls, note count, delete, and localStorage persistence.

ui_bugs.issue: data-testid for done and delete buttons use dynamic IDs (expanded-delete-note-{id}, expanded-close-note-{id}) instead of static 'done-btn' and 'delete-btn' as documented in review_request. Minor discrepancy but not a functional issue.

issues: Composer has 4 color dots (butter yellow, grass green, mint green, sky blue) - correct per spec. A 5th selected-state indicator may be counted as extra by selectors.

action_items: Minor: Consider aligning data-testid values for done/delete buttons in ExpandedNoteCard to match documented 'done-btn' and 'delete-btn' for easier testability
critical_code_review_comments: data-testid for expanded card buttons use dynamic IDs (expanded-delete-note-{id}, expanded-close-note-{id}) which makes static selector-based testing harder. Consider adding static aliases.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core flows tested and working: board loads with title/empty state, + opens composer with 4 colors/mic/throw button, throwable sticker appears at bottom center after throw, drag to board places sticker, click sticker expands card with sticker character/text/date/delete/done, zoom in/out/reset works (100%->120%, 80%, 100%), localStorage persistence verified (notes survive page reload), delete from expanded view works. The expanded card done/delete button testids are dynamic: expanded-delete-note-{id} and expanded-close-note-{id}.
